definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: A light tube hangs below the shelves on four leather straps.
sentences.chinese: 灯管用四条皮革带挂在架子的下方。

sentences.english: Inner explosion-proof single-pole can be started up momentarily.
sentences.chinese: 内装防爆专用单极瞬时启动灯管，能快速瞬时启动。

sentences.english: The lamp-tube unified the end-caps by Al-support for easy changing of lamp-tube.
sentences.chinese: 灯管利用铝支梁与端盖连成一体，便于更换灯管。

sentences.english: The number of lumens a bulb produces for each watt it consumes.
sentences.chinese: 一个灯管消耗每单位瓦特所产生的流明数。

sentences.english: Though costlier, xenon allows a discharge lamp to start far more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 尽管成本高，氙气能够迅速启动发电灯管。

sentences.english: Large scale enhanced the lamp tube service life, international still did not have the precedent.
sentences.chinese: 大幅度地提高了灯管的使用寿命，国际尚无先例。

sentences.english: What is more, the hanging case could install a light tube to gain extra lighting.
sentences.chinese: 又可以在吊柜底装上灯管配合照明方便。

sentences.english: Ensure that the UV disinfection lamp life of more than 5500 hours of work.
sentences.chinese: 确保紫外线杀菌消毒灯管工作寿命大于5500小时。

sentences.english: The Bunsen flame becomes smaller, then burns in the burner tube, and finally goes out rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 本生焰缩小，然后在灯管中燃烧，最后迅速熄灭。

sentences.english: Using ultra-strong phosphorous light, with the collected light of several beams of daylight lamp.
sentences.chinese: 采用超强三磷光，具有多束灯管的光束值。

sentences.english: Strong exhaust devices improve and gas lamp parts and long service life.
sentences.chinese: 强排风装置，提高灯管及气件的使用寿命长。

sentences.english: And the SuperBulb, as a product, was turning out to have some problems.
sentences.chinese: 超级灯管，作为一项产品，还存在很多问题。

sentences.english: The microwave energy to power these lamps is generated by magnetrons.
sentences.chinese: 激发这些灯管的能量由磁电管产生。
